scripts.setup: echo 'Setting up Error Ingestion Workflow for Knowledge Center' && echo 'Workspace: $CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_NAME' && echo 'Root path: $CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH' && WORKSPACE_PATH="${CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH}/.conductor/${CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_NAME}" && echo "Knowledge center path: $WORKSPACE_PATH" && cd "$WORKSPACE_PATH" && pwd && echo 'Workspace ready for error ingestion'
scripts.run: WORKSPACE_PATH="${CONDUCTOR_ROOT_PATH}/.conductor/${CONDUCTOR_WORKSPACE_NAME}" && cd "$WORKSPACE_PATH" && echo 'Ready to ingest errors into knowledge center at:' && pwd && echo 'Available commands:' && echo '  - Use /error to submit errors' && echo '  - Check WORKFLOW.md for detailed instructions' && echo '  - Templates available in templates/' && ls -1 templates/
